name: ZombieRunner
description:
Zombie Runner was suppose to be an app game. Unfortunately due to some circumstances the game is only available on desktop!!!

This is a survival type of game where you run as a zombie and try to avoid all the obstacles ahead of you. This also requires the player to think in some situations and see how they can avoid the obstacles ahead of them.

This is my first ever mobile game I have been working on. More games to come soon but on actual mobile devices.
